name: Elite Sniper - Illegal Drift Race Sharp Shooter Simulator 2016
name_original: Elite Sniper - Illegal Drift Race Sharp Shooter Simulator 2016
description:
Be the Police Sniper HERO who cathces the bad guys!
Let's Aim and Shoot! Elite Sniper is a fun and challenging sharp shooting game!
Be the ultimate american cop sniper!

Controls:
- Aim and Tap to shoot!

Features:
- Realistic weapons and upgrade system
- HD Realistic scenes
- Action cameras
- Illegal drift racers
- Challenging and addictive gameplay

Play with your friends on your iPhone / iPad!

Shoot and Share!
